unnormalised: **Social Media Buzz: Brand Collaborations Taking Over!**
normalised: **Social Media Buzz: Brand Collaborations Taking Over!**

unnormalised: Hey guys, ever feel like your Insta feed is just a never-ending stream of ads? Well, you're not wrong! Brand collaborations are exploding right now, especially in the Indian influencer scene.
normalised: Hey guys, ever feel like your Insta feed is just a never-ending stream of ads? Well, you are not wrong! Brand collaborations are exploding right now, especially in the Indian influencer scene.

unnormalised: Think about it: your favorite YouTuber, Pooja from Delhi, suddenly raving about the new Dosa King app? Yep, paid partnership! And it's not just food apps; fashion, beauty, even fintech startups are jumping on the bandwagon.
normalised: Think about it: your favorite YouTuber, Pooja from Delhi, suddenly raving about the new Dosa King app? Yep, paid partnership! And it is not just food apps; fashion, beauty, even fintech startups are jumping on the bandwagon.

unnormalised: Remember that crazy Onam campaign last month with the influencers promoting Kerala Tourism alongside local sari brands? Genius!
normalised: Remember that crazy Onam campaign last month with the influencers promoting Kerala Tourism alongside local sari brands? Genius!

unnormalised: Even big institutions like IIT Madras are getting in on the action, partnering with ed-tech companies for reach. It’s estimated that collaborations are up by 30% this quarter alone.
normalised: Even big institutions like I I T Madras are getting in on the action, partnering with ed-tech companies for reach. It is estimated that collaborations are up by thirty percent this quarter alone.

unnormalised: But are we getting collaboration fatigue? Some are saying the constant shilling is turning them off. Others argue it’s just smart marketing in the age of social media.
normalised: But are we getting collaboration fatigue? Some are saying the constant shilling is turning them off. Others argue it is just smart marketing in the age of social media.

unnormalised: What do you think? Are you craving some Biryani after seeing your favourite influencer post about it, or are you hitting the "unfollow" button? Let us know in the comments!
normalised: What do you think? Are you craving some Biryani after seeing your favourite influencer post about it, or are you hitting the "unfollow" button? Let us know in the comments!
